athenaPrompt: Picture insights flowing straight into execution. Ask Athena.

body.fallback: Explore-Synthesize-Ignite. Three phases that turn scattered insights into systematic action. Most companies stop at exploration. Some get to synthesis. We build until ignition. The framework connects research to strategy to execution in one continuous flow.

share.subject: Worth looking at: ESI Framework from Prismatica Labs
share.body:
Hey,

I came across this and thought it might help with [ADD_YOUR_CHALLENGE_HERE].

It's called the ESI Framework - basically a system that connects insights to actual implementation. Explore uncovers truth, Synthesize turns it into strategy, Ignite makes it executable.

Six weeks, starts at £40,000. They map the whole thing from research through execution.

If we talk to them next week, we could have results by {deliveryDate} or earlier.

Here's the link: {url}

Worth a conversation?
